name: notes on crying
description:
A tiny, little game about crying and the like, for when you're feeling sad but don't want to start crying, or for when you're feeling sad and do need to cry a little bit.

how to play:

When you feel like crying, move the little cat using the WASD keys, or the arrow keys. Use the space bar to slow down and show your heart. Avoid the tear drops and the  sadness to stop yourself from crying, or run into them if you need to. Do whatever will make you feel better! Oh! your phone is beeping too! I wonder who it is... (press the Q key when the prompt shows to check). Refresh the page whenever you want to restart the game.

features:

  • a little horned creature
  • a lonely couch and lamp
  • tears and sadness, but with some support as well
  • some tender mental health care

from the developer:

Hi all! My name is April, and this is my first game! The game itself is very short since I wanted its development to be a learning experience. Regardless, I hope you like it! It was inspired by my own mental health experiences. Thanks a bunch for playing/viewing it!
